channel.title: Oisín Flynn-Connolly — Now
channel.description: Recent articles, talks, and events from Oisín Flynn-Connolly.

item.title: Central limits via dilated categories
item.description: New preprint with Henning Basold, Chase Ford and Hao Wang. We introduce dilated seminorm-enriched category theory as a unifying framework for central limits.

item.title: On associative and commutative differential graded algebras in positive characteristic
item.description: Expository paper published in Mathematical Intelligencer (2026).

item.title: On the divisibility of sums of Fibonacci numbers
item.description: Published in Integers: Electronic Journal of Combinatorial Number Theory (2025).

item.title: Determinant Massey products — Topological Activities seminar, Stockholm University
Mathematical Structures in Computer Science — Leiden University
item.description: Lecturer and tutorial supervision, third year course, 2025–2026.

item.title: Co-Eilenberg Moore categories for operads — NetTCS, University of Twente
